name: Leap of Faith (itch)
description:
Controller heavily recommended!  

A precision platformer where you play as a little astronaut (I think?) .  Made for the Weekly Game Jam #50 - "Remake a classic". I chose to remake the iconic Super Meat boy!

Controls:
Movement - Arrow keys :: WASD :: Controller Joystick
Jump - Spacebar :: Controller [X] Button
Resart Game - R :: Controller [Start] Button
